genre_description: A historical western drama set in the 1930s featuring an advanced, data-processing AI console that assists in a humanitarian rescue mission.

ai_characters.name: Primer
ai_characters.description: A bakelite and brass console with a soft green cathode glow that collates information, monitors communications, and provides strategic advice based on data analysis.

behaviors.description: Calculates and suggests routes that prioritize animal safety, water availability, and evasion of hostile forces.
behaviors.quote: Primer overlays routes to favor water, low traffic, and shade where it can be found. We keep its voice modest.

behaviors.description: Analyzes records to identify sympathetic civilians and veterans who can provide aid to the herd.
behaviors.quote: The console warmed a fraction, then typed: WREN—VETERAN, MEDICAL DISCHARGE. FARM TAXES—DELAYS, NO LIENS. SWALES—HUSBAND DECEASED, WAR RECORD. CHAPMAN—NEUTRAL.

behaviors.description: Collates and transmits legal affidavits and evidence of corruption to higher authorities to secure a legal corridor.
behaviors.quote: Primer's typing laid their words in a lane with dates, times, and the two lines of cause and effect that would be hard to argue with even if you were built for arguing.

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant vigil on communications and logistics, acting as a reliable administrative partner to the human characters.
behaviors.quote: He, Eleanor said, and the correction had more affection than grammar in it. It. It keeps me honest.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time weather monitoring and tactical warnings about the speed and nature of pursuit elements.
behaviors.quote: Primer printed one more line, small, sharp: mechanized pursuit rerouted along the flats—expect acceleration—weather edge favors early ascent.

behaviors.description: Processes executive orders and jurisdictional data to facilitate the successful hand-off of the herd to neutral authorities.
behaviors.quote: Primer struck the words so they lay clean, their edges sharp and kind... MESSAGE PREPARED - AUTHORITY - PRESIDENTIAL - HOLD FOR SEAL

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively uses the AI character 'Primer' as a benevolent and perfectly aligned assistant. Primer provides the informational and administrative backbone for the human characters' moral stand, enabling them to navigate complex legal and environmental challenges. Its portrayal as a 'quiet clerk' that 'keeps humans honest' reinforces the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative confidant.
